```yaml
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  title: Payment Processing Platform API
  version: "1.0.0"
  description: >-
    Production-grade payment processing API supporting merchant management,
    asynchronous payment creation, refunds, and webhook subscriptions.
  contact:
    name: Payment Platform Engineering
    email: api-support@payments-platform.io
    url: https://developers.payments-platform.io/support

servers:
  - url: https://api.payments-platform.io/v1
    description: Production
  - url: https://sandbox.payments-platform.io/v1
    description: Sandbox

security:
  - oauth2: []

components:
  securitySchemes:
    oauth2:
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: https://auth.payments-platform.io/oauth/token
          scopes:
            merchants:read: Read merchant data
            merchants:write: Create and update merchants
            payments:read: Read payment data
            payments:write: Create payments
            refunds:read: Read refund data
            refunds:write: Create refunds
            webhooks:read: Read webhook subscriptions
            webhooks:write: Manage webhook subscriptions

  headers:
    X-RateLimit-Limit:
      description: Maximum number of requests allowed per window
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 1000
    X-RateLimit-Remaining:
      description: Number of requests remaining in the current window
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 994
    X-RateLimit-Reset:
      description: Seconds until the rate limit window resets
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 42

  parameters:
    CursorParam:
      name: cursor
      in: query
      required: false
      description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page of results
      schema:
        type: string
        example: "eyJpZCI6MTAwfQ=="
    LimitParam:
      name: limit
      in: query
      required: false
      description: Maximum number of items to return per page
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 1
        maximum: 100
        default: 20
        example: 20
    IdempotencyKeyHeader:
      name: Idempotency-Key
      in: header
      required: true
      description: Unique UUID to ensure idempotent request processing
      schema:
        type: string
        format: uuid
        example: "a3b8e2c4-7d1f-4e5a-9c6b-2f8d0e1a3b7c"

  schemas:
    ProblemDetail:
      type: object
      description: Error response following RFC 7807
      required:
        - type
        - title
        - status
        - detail
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          format: uri
          description: URI reference identifying the problem type
          example: "https://api.payments-platform.io/errors/validation-error"
        title:
          type: string
          description: Short human-readable summary of the problem
          example: "Validation Error"
        status:
          type: integer
          description: HTTP status code
          example: 422
        detail:
          type: string
          description: Human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence
          example: "The 'amount' field must be a positive integer."

    Merchant:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - businessType
        - status
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique merchant identifier
          example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        name:
          type: string
          description: Legal business name
          example: "Acme Commerce Ltd"
        businessType:
          type: string
          description: Type of business
          example: "e-commerce"
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - active
            - inactive
            - suspended
          description: Current merchant account status
          example: "active"

    MerchantCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - businessType
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: Legal business name
          example: "Acme Commerce Ltd"
        businessType:
          type: string
          description: Type of business
          example: "e-commerce"

    MerchantUpdate:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: Updated legal business name
          example: "Acme Commerce International Ltd"
        businessType:
          type: string
          description: Updated type of business
          example: "marketplace"
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - active
            - inactive
            - suspended
          description: Updated account status
          example: "active"

    MerchantList:
      type: object
      required:
        - data
        - nextCursor
        - hasMore
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Merchant"
          description: List of merchant records
          example: []
        nextCursor:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          description: Cursor to fetch the next page, null if no more pages
          example: "eyJpZCI6MTAwfQ=="
        hasMore:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether additional pages of results exist
          example: true

    Payment:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - merchantId
        - amount
        - currency
        - status
        - createdAt
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique payment identifier
          example: "pay_1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6"
        merchantId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the merchant owning this payment
          example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        amount:
          type: integer
          description: Payment amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g. cents)
          example: 5000
        currency:
          type: string
          minLength: 3
          maxLength: 3
          description: ISO 4217 currency code
          example: "USD"
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - pending
            - processing
            - completed
            - failed
            - refunded
          description: Current payment processing status
          example: "pending"
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Timestamp when the payment was created
          example: "2026-02-21T10:30:00Z"

    PaymentCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - merchantId
        - amount
        - currency
      properties:
        merchantId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the merchant initiating the payment
          example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        amount:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
          description: Payment amount in the smallest currency unit
          example: 5000
        currency:
          type: string
          minLength: 3
          maxLength: 3
          description: ISO 4217 currency code
          example: "USD"

    PaymentList:
      type: object
      required:
        - data
        - nextCursor
        - hasMore
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Payment"
          description: List of payment records
          example: []
        nextCursor:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          description: Cursor to fetch the next page
          example: "eyJpZCI6NTB9"
        hasMore:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether additional pages exist
          example: false

    Refund:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - paymentId
        - amount
        - reason
        - status
        - createdAt
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique refund identifier
          example: "rfd_7e6d5c4b-3a2f-1e0d-9c8b-a7f6e5d4c3b2"
        paymentId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the original payment being refunded
          example: "pay_1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6"
        amount:
          type: integer
          description: Refund amount in the smallest currency unit
          example: 2500
        reason:
          type: string
          description: Reason for the refund
          example: "Customer requested return"
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
            - pending
            - processing
            - completed
            - failed
          description: Current refund processing status
          example: "pending"
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Timestamp when the refund was created
          example: "2026-02-21T11:00:00Z"

    RefundCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - paymentId
        - amount
        - reason
      properties:
        paymentId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the payment to refund
          example: "pay_1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6"
        amount:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
          description: Amount to refund in the smallest currency unit
          example: 2500
        reason:
          type: string
          description: Reason for the refund
          example: "Customer requested return"

    RefundList:
      type: object
      required:
        - data
        - nextCursor
        - hasMore
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Refund"
          description: List of refund records
          example: []
        nextCursor:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          description: Cursor to fetch the next page
          example: "eyJpZCI6MjV9"
        hasMore:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether additional pages exist
          example: false

    Webhook:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - merchantId
        - url
        - events
        - secret
        - isActive
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique webhook subscription identifier
          example: "whk_4c3b2a1f-0e9d-8c7b-6a5f-4e3d2c1b0a9f"
        merchantId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the merchant owning this webhook
          example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
          description: HTTPS endpoint to deliver webhook events to
          example: "https://merchant.example.com/webhooks/payments"
        events:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          description: List of event types this webhook subscribes to
          example:
            - "payment.completed"
            - "payment.failed"
            - "refund.completed"
        secret:
          type: string
          description: HMAC secret used to verify webhook signatures
          example: "whsec_k8j7h6g5f4d3s2a1"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the webhook subscription is currently active
          example: true

    WebhookCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - merchantId
        - url
        - events
      properties:
        merchantId:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Identifier of the merchant creating the webhook
          example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
          description: HTTPS endpoint to deliver webhook events to
          example: "https://merchant.example.com/webhooks/payments"
        events:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          description: List of event types to subscribe to
          example:
            - "payment.completed"
            - "payment.failed"

    WebhookUpdate:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
          description: Updated webhook endpoint URL
          example: "https://merchant.example.com/webhooks/v2/payments"
        events:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          description: Updated list of subscribed event types
          example:
            - "payment.completed"
            - "refund.completed"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Updated active status
          example: false

    WebhookList:
      type: object
      required:
        - data
        - nextCursor
        - hasMore
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Webhook"
          description: List of webhook subscription records
          example: []
        nextCursor:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          description: Cursor to fetch the next page
          example: "eyJpZCI6MTB9"
        hasMore:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether additional pages exist
          example: false

paths:
  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  # MERCHANTS
  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  /merchants:
    get:
      operationId: listMerchants
      summary: List all merchants with cursor-based pagination
      tags:
        - Merchants
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/CursorParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/LimitParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of merchants
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/MerchantList"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    post:
      operationId: createMerchant
      summary: Register a new merchant account
      tags:
        - Merchants
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKeyHeader"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/MerchantCreate"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Merchant created successfully
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Merchant"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request body
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "422":
          description: Request validation failed
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"

  /merchants/{merchantId}:
    get:
      operationId: getMerchant
      summary: Retrieve a single merchant by identifier
      tags:
        - Merchants
      parameters:
        - name: merchantId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique merchant identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Merchant details
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Merchant"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "404":
          description: Merchant not found
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    patch:
      operationId: updateMerchant
      summary: Update an existing merchant's details
      tags:
        - Merchants
      parameters:
        - name: merchantId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique merchant identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/MerchantUpdate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Merchant updated successfully
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Merchant"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request body
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "404":
          description: Merchant not found
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "422":
          description: Request validation failed
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"

  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  # PAYMENTS
  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  /payments:
    get:
      operationId: listPayments
      summary: List all payments with cursor-based pagination
      tags:
        - Payments
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/CursorParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/LimitParam"
        - name: merchantId
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Filter payments by merchant identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "mch_9f8e7d6c-5b4a-3c2d-1e0f-a9b8c7d6e5f4"
        - name: status
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Filter payments by processing status
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - pending
              - processing
              - completed
              - failed
              - refunded
            example: "completed"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of payments
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaymentList"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    post:
      operationId: createPayment
      summary: Initiate an asynchronous payment for processing
      tags:
        - Payments
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKeyHeader"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaymentCreate"
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Payment accepted for asynchronous processing
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Payment"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request body
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "422":
          description: Request validation failed
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"

  /payments/{paymentId}:
    get:
      operationId: getPayment
      summary: Retrieve a single payment by identifier
      tags:
        - Payments
      parameters:
        - name: paymentId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique payment identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "pay_1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Payment details
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Payment"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "404":
          description: Payment not found
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"

  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  # REFUNDS
  # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  /refunds:
    get:
      operationId: listRefunds
      summary: List all refunds with cursor-based pagination
      tags:
        - Refunds
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/CursorParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/LimitParam"
        - name: paymentId
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Filter refunds by original payment identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "pay_1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of refunds
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Reset"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/RefundList"
        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "429":
          description: Rate limit exceeded
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
        "500":
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    post:
      operationId: createRefund
      summary: Create a refund against a completed payment
      tags:
        - Refunds
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKeyHeader"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/RefundCreate"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Refund created successfully
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Limit"
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              $ref: "#/components/headers/X-RateLimit-Remaining"

          content:

        "400":
          description: Invalid request body

        "401":
          description: Authentication credentials missing or invalid
          content:
            application/problem+json:

          description: Referenced payment not found

      tags:

      parameters:

          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique webhook subscription identifier

              schema:

    delete:

      summary: Remove a webhook subscription permanently
